data.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
data.author: B.B. King

data.quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education.
data.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

data.quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
data.author: John Dewey

data.quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
data.author: Plutarch

data.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
data.author: John Wooden

data.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
data.author: Helen Hayes

data.quote: The more you know, the more you realize how much you don't know.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: If you want something done right, do it yourself.
data.author: Charles-Guillaume Étienne

data.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
data.author: Audrey Hepburn

data.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: What we learn with pleasure we never forget.
data.author: Alfred Mercier

data.quote: Nothing ventured, nothing attained.
data.author: Peter McWilliams

data.quote: And then I realized adventure was the best way to learn.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
data.author: Malcolm X

data.quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: If you think education is expensive, try ignorance.
data.author: Andy McIntyre

data.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: The only person who is educated is the one who has learned how to learn and change.
data.author: Carl Rogers

data.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education.
data.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

data.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
data.author: William Butler Yeats

data.quote: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
data.author: George Washington Carver

data.quote: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
data.author: Sydney J. Harris

data.quote: Education is not a problem. Education is an opportunity.
data.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

data.quote: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Education is not the answer to the question. Education is the means to the answer to all questions.
data.author: William Allin

data.quote: Education is a better safeguard of liberty than a standing army.
data.author: Edward Everett

data.quote: The more I live, the more I learn. The more I learn, the more I realize, the less I know.
data.author: Michel Legrand

data.quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
data.author: Leonardo da Vinci

data.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.
data.author: Leo Buscaglia

data.quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
data.author: Brad Henry

data.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: The more you know, the more you realize you know nothing.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
data.author: Chinese Proverb

data.quote: A good head and good heart are always a formidable combination. But when you add to that a literate tongue or pen, then you have something very special.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that nobody can take it away from you.
data.author: B.B. King

data.quote: The more you read, the more things you will know, the more that you learn, the more places you’ll go.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
data.author: Allan Bloom

data.quote: The mind is like a parachute. It doesn't work if it is not open.
data.author: Frank Zappa

data.quote: The only thing that interferes with my learning is my education.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: The more I read, the more I acquire, the more certain I am that I know nothing.
data.author: Voltaire

data.quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
data.author: Abigail Adams

data.quote: A well-educated mind will always have more questions than answers.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
data.author: Robert Frost

data.quote: Education is not only a ladder of opportunity, but it is also an investment in our future.
data.author: Ed Markey

data.quote: The illiterate of the 21st century will not be those who cannot read and write, but those who cannot learn, unlearn, and relearn.
data.author: Alvin Toffler

data.quote: Learning is the eye of the mind.
data.author: French Proverb

data.quote: You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.
data.author: Conrad Hall

data.quote: The more you learn, the more you earn.
data.author: Warren Buffett

data.quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
data.author: Albert Einstein
